<?php





for($i=0;$i<$urlCount;$i++){



 $localUrl=saveRemoteImg($arrUrls[$i]);
 if($localUrl)$arrUrls[$i]=$localUrl;




}
foreach($arrUrlsas $key=>$vo){



  $arrUrls[$key]=$_GET['prefix'].'lib/xheditor-1.1.14/demos/'.$vo;




}
echo implode('|',$arrUrls);





?>
